scripts.prepare: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if (process.env.CI || process.env.HUSKY==='0') process.exit(0); if (!fs.existsSync('scripts/setup-husky.cjs')) process.exit(0); require('./scripts/setup-husky.cjs');"
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:api && pnpm run lint:web
scripts.verify:common: node tools/ensure-npm-ci.mjs && pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:api && pnpm run build:web && pnpm run lint && pnpm run test:api:e2e && pnpm run test:smoke && pnpm run runtime-smoke
scripts.verify:local: pnpm run clean && pnpm run verify:common
scripts.verify:ci: pnpm run clean && pnpm run verify:common
scripts.promote:prod: node -e "const{spawnSync}=require('node:child_process');const project=process.env.GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT||process.env.GCP_PROJECT_ID||'';const okProject=project==='papadata-platform-prod';const confirmed=process.env.CONFIRM_PROD==='1';if(!okProject&&!confirmed){console.error('Refusing to deploy. Set GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT=papadata-platform-prod (or GCP_PROJECT_ID) or CONFIRM_PROD=1.');process.exit(1);}const resolvedProject=okProject?project:'papadata-platform-prod';const result=spawnSync('gcloud',['builds','submit','--config','cloudbuild/prod.yaml','--project',resolvedProject],{stdio:'inherit'});process.exit(result.status??1);"
